channel.title: Serializing an Array
channel.description:
Okay, maybe not the best title. In PHP, there is a [url=http://php.net/serialize]function[/url] that can serialize objects, and I've mainly used this for arrays.
I was wondering if there was a way to do the same thing in Java - convert an array into a String that can then be decoded back into an array.

item.title: Serializing an Array
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

Java also provides serialization. A class simply has to implement the Serializable interface. In Java, arrays essentially are objects, so yes, you can serialize arrays. Remember though, that the contents of the array also have to implement the ‘Serializable’ interface.

Additional useful resources:
http://download.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/io/ObjectOutputStream.html
http://download.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/io/ObjectInputStream.html

Read full topic
